Name: SwitchFreezePlanet
Notes: A special planet object that uses an additional "Ice" model that will appear when its cutscene functor action gets triggered.

Obj_arg0.Name: Already Frozen?
Obj_arg0.Description: If set, the planet will already use its "Ice" model.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_DEAD.Description: Can be activated when the object is killed through a cutscene action.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.

DemoCast.Description: The object takes part in the cutscene. It special cutscene functor action causes it to freeze up.
